column2:
# Create the plot
ggplot(test, aes(x = date)) +
   geom_rect(aes(xmin = min(test$date)-2, xmax = max(test$date)+2, ymin = -Inf, ymax = PWP), 
             fill = "brown4", alpha = 0.05)+
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = min(test$date)-2, xmax = max(test$date)+2, ymin = PWP, ymax = FC),
            fill = "darkgreen", alpha = 0.05)+
  geom_bar(aes(y = rainfall), stat = "identity", fill = "blue", alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_bar(aes(y = irrigation), stat = "identity", fill = "lightblue", alpha = 0.8) +
  geom_line(aes(y = soil_moisture_calculated, color = "Calculated Soil Moisture"), size = 1.5) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = PWP, linetype = "dashed", color = "brown") +  
  geom_hline(yintercept = FC, linetype = "dashed", color = "black") +  
  scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~./10, name = "Soil Moisture (%)")) +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Legend", values = c("Calculated Soil Moisture" = "darkred", "Soil Probe Reading" = "blue")) +
  labs(x = "Date", y = "Irrigation (mm)", title = "Irrigation and Soil Moisture over Time") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "top")
